products.title: Stirlo Oyster Cream
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Oyster Cream Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Oyster Cream Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.productdescription: Warm and creamy, the Burst Pearl is the perfect blind if you are needing a lightly coloured blind but white is too sharp for your tastes. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.productdescription: The Amor Pearl Roller blind has a touch of cream to it, making this a very versatile colour. This is the perfect blind for people who don't want the bright white of some blinds, but like the crisp effect, white gives a room. Additionally, the Amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, kitchens and living rooms. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light. If you like these colours check them out as vertical blinds too. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.
